column1: # TBM3 Data file for ERL Madrid - October 2018
# HELP:    - all data is comma delimited
#          - Case can be mixed - as all converted to lower case internally
#         Field 1   = P for Person OR I for Inanimate object
#         Field 2   = persons name OR object name
#         Field 3&4 = 1st location & probability of being there
#         Field 5&6 = 2nd location & probability of being there
#         Field 7&8 = 3rd location & probability of being there
######   Location defintions not linked to any partcular object OR person   #####
